Articles.Content:
I've somehow deleted the contracts widget button from my game save. I was simply playing, and I noticed that at some point the button had been removed from the flight screen, making it very hard to complete contracts. Contracts can still be completed, but I can't check my progress with any kind of ease. I have deleted my game data (using Steam) and I redownloaded the game and ported my save over, but that did not restore the widget.

I have looked over the game's hotkeys and I don't see anything about hiding or managing on screen widgets. The debug menu doesn't provide any answers either. Is there some hidden key combination that I'm not seeing?

I figure I might just have to paste in a few lines to my save file, but any relevant parts of the .sfs file are no longer there.
